alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; New Madrid; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 2:26PM CDT until August 26 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... Southern Scott County in southeastern Missouri... Northeastern New Madrid County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hay-Wood City, or just north of Miner, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sikeston, Charleston, East Prairie, Miner, Bertrand, Morley, Anniston, Hay-Wood City, Blodgett and Diehlstadt. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 1 and 13. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 60 and 81. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
